description: Modeled after a classic Greek egg lemon soup, this is one of many light, comforting soups that make a nice home for leftover turkey If you haven’t made stock with the turkey carcass, a quick garlic or vegetable stock will do Make sure that the soup is not at a boil when you add the tempered egg-lemon mixture, or the egg yolks will curdle
title: Egg Lemon Soup With Turkey
title_page: Egg Lemon Soup With Turkey Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Modeled after a classic Greek egg lemon soup, this is one of many light, comforting soups that make a nice home for leftover turkey. If you haven’t made stock with the turkey carcass, a quick garlic or vegetable stock will do. Make sure that the soup is not at a boil when you add the tempered egg-lemon mixture, or the egg yolks will curdle. The soup should be creamy.
Featured in: Soup, Salad And Stir Fry With Thanksgiving Leftovers.
Learn: How to Make Soup
